New Records: Rohit Sharma scored 92 off 41 balls, breaking a record for the lowest score at which an individual player had brought up a half-century in T20Is (52)
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma's 92 off 41 balls, Axar Patel's sensational catch on the boundary, Kuldeep Yadav's googly to dismiss Glenn Maxwell
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma's selflessness and commitment to an attacking game at personal cost were praised by Sanjay Manjrekar
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia's hopes of making the final four were dealt a blow, with Bangladesh needing to beat Afghanistan by non-colossal margins to help them advance
